## Welcome to the workshop

<img src="images/Rlogo.png" height=128 width=128>
<img src="favicon.png" height=128 width=128>


The goal of this workshop is to provide you with basic R skills.  At the end of the workshop, you may not be an R ninja, but you will be able to do basic data analysis and visualization.  Furthermore, you should have the tools and confidence to teach yourself new analyses in the future.
